glsa.title: KPdf: Heap based overflow
glsa.synopsis: KPdf includes vulnerable Xpdf code to handle PDF files, making it vulnerable to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: KPdf is a KDE-based PDF viewer included in the kdegraphics package.

description.p: KPdf includes Xpdf code to handle PDF files. Dirk Mueller discovered that the Xpdf code is vulnerable a heap based overflow in the splash rasterizer engine.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file with Kpdf, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the affected application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All kdegraphics users should upgrade to the latest version:
